div.head: Acknowledgments
div.p: The Bob Richards Productions Collection was processed and preserved as part of the "Uncovering New Chicago Archives Project," funded with support from the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: The Bob Richards Productions Collection contains a photograph of Ray Brown and Roy Eldridge.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Richards, Bob. Productions. Collection, [Box#, Folder#], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Bob Richards is a Chicago photographer.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: The Bob Richards Productions Collection contains a photograph of Ray Brown and Roy Eldridge taken by Bob Richards.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
